pages.title: Growing Up
pages.text: A turn ability that increases Saps power by 1.

pages.title: Stone Toss
pages.text: A play ability that causes a direct attack for 1 damage. This does not cause the opponent to fight back, but will cause any fight or damaged triggers.

pages.title: Tasty Bacon
pages.text: A death ability that causes Oinke's player to gain 2 life.

pages.title: Stoke Flames
pages.text: A death ability that causes all of your buddies in the fire grouping to gain 1 power.

pages.title: Iron Temper
pages.text: A kill ability that causes Metalico to gain 1 power when it kills another buddy. This will trigger before any death triggers, and can save Metalico from death.

pages.title: Simple Enchant
pages.text: A play ability that causes all of your buddies in the enchantable grouping to gain 1 power.

pages.title: Milk Maid
pages.text: A free activated ability. When you click on Betsy and have at least 1 buddy with a status effect, negative or positive, all of your buddies will be cleared of status effects.

pages.title: Snowball Fight
pages.text: A play ability that causes the opponent to lose 1 life. This does not count as an attack and will not trigger any abilities.

pages.title: Wash Out
pages.text: A death ability that clears all fire status effects and deals 1 damage to each buddy in the fire grouping. Any damage caused by this will not cause attack or damage triggers.

pages.title: Tasty Treat
pages.text: A death ability that causes you to gain 1 life.

pages.title: Fresh Harvest
pages.text: A death ability that causes all of your buddies in the animal grouping to gain 2 power.

pages.title: Feeding Time
pages.text: A play ability that causes all of your buddies in the animal grouping to gain 1 power.

pages.title: Play Fetch
pages.text: A kill ability that causes you to draw a card if you have space whenever Yang kills another buddy. This will trigger before any death triggers which can possibly keep the buddy alive.

pages.title: Lazy Cat
pages.text: A free activated ability. Cannot be activated when Yin has a status effect. When clicked, Yin will gain 2 power and gain a sleep status effect, causing it to skip its next attack.

pages.title: Gilded Gift
pages.text: A play ability that causes all of your buddies in the food grouping to gain 1 power.

pages.title: Rich Trade
pages.text: A play ability that draws you cards until you can't draw any more cards.

pages.title: Unbreakable
pages.text: A damaged ability that causes Dio to gain 1 power when it has a damage trigger. Not all power loss or attacks trigger it, but combat damage does.

pages.title: Delicious Desert
pages.text: A death ability that causes you to gain 3 life.

pages.title: Energize
pages.text: A turn ability that causes power triggers for all of your adjacent buddies in the redstone grouping.

pages.title: Sweet Treat
pages.text: A death ability that causes you to gain 2 life.

pages.title: Spook Em
pages.text: A fight ability that causes an opposing buddy to lose 1 power. This happens before damage and only if there is an opposing buddy.

pages.title: Premium Enchant
pages.text: A play ability that causes all of your buddies in the enchantable grouping to gain 2 power.

pages.title: XP Farm
pages.text: A kill ability that causes all of your buddies in the enchantable grouping to gain 1 power.

pages.title: Anvil Drop
pages.text: A play ability that deals 4 damage to an opposing buddycard. This damage is direct and causes attack and damage triggers.

pages.title: Reforge
pages.text: A turn ability that causes your buddies in the metal grouping to gain 1 power. This includes Caster itself.

pages.title: Push Back
pages.text: A play ability that will return the opposing buddy to its owner's hand. Will only trigger if there is space in the opponents hand.

pages.title: Empowered Push
pages.text: A powered ability that will return the opposing buddy to its owner's hand. Will only trigger if there is space in the opponents hand.

pages.title: Prismarine Spines
pages.text: A damaged ability that causes the source of the damage, if one of the enemies buddies, loses 1 power. This only works off of direct damage thhat can trigger damaged abilities.

pages.title: Laser Gaze
pages.text: A turn ability that deals 2 damage to an opposing buddy every odd turn. Worth noting that this does not start specifically on the turn that Knight is played, but is based on the number of YOUR turns that has passed.

pages.title: Grand Creation
pages.text: A play ability that chooses cards at random from your deck to play in any of your empty slots.

pages.title: Craft Together
pages.text: A death ability that will attempt to regain power by removing your adjacent buddies and gaining power equal to their power when removed. If they can, the death is canceled.

pages.title: Smeltdown
pages.text: A play ability that kills all of your other buddies not in the metal grouping, then gains Meltor 2 power for each buddy removed this way. This can also trigger Meltor's second ability when killing fire buddies.

pages.title: Flaming Forge
pages.text: An observe death ability limited to buddies in the fire grouping. When a buddy from the fire grouping dies, Meltor and your buddies of the metal grouping gain power.

pages.title: Thick Thicket
pages.text: A turn ability that increases Angsty Saps power by 2 as long as there are no buddies in adjacent slots.

pages.title: Conduction
pages.text: A powered ability that increases Coppor's power by 1.

pages.title: Courage Chime
pages.text: A death ability that increases your other buddies power by 1.

pages.title: Drip Drop
pages.text: A turn ability that returns Dropper to your hand if there is space in your hand. This happens after draw.

pages.title: Pulse Extender
pages.text: A powered ability that increases Tick's power by 1 and powers adjacent redstone buddies twice. Tick will die if they reach 8 power this way.

pages.title: Waiting Game
pages.text: A play ability that increases Tock's power by the turn number divided by 2 (This includes enemy turns, and is rounded down.)

pages.title: Travel Game
pages.text: A play ability that increases Whare's power by the number of total buddies in play.

pages.title: Axo-Regeneration
pages.text: A kill ability that gives Ambystoma the Regeneration status effect.

pages.title: Rare Blue
pages.text: A play ability that has a 1/10 chance to increase Ambystoma's power by 6.

pages.title: Railway
pages.text: A turn ability that attempts to move Kart to an adjacent empty slot and increases its power by 2. Won't trigger with no empty adjacent slots.

pages.title: Mine Crash
pages.text: A powered ability that deals 10 damage to the opponent if Kart has 10 or more power.
